term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - standard thermodynamic quantities
term.title: standard thermodynamic quantities

item.text: Values of thermodynamic functions in the standard state characterized by a standard pressure, molality or amount concentration, but not by temperature. Standard quantities are denoted by adding the superscript Θ or ° to the symbol of the quantity.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 533. 'Standard quantities in chemical thermodynamics. Fugacities, activities and equilibrium constants for pure and mixed phases (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 536 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466030533)
